statements: SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-07-15';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, provider_id, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 100 AND provider_id = 200;
SELECT * FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE provider_id = 1 AND appointment_status = 'Scheduled'
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE patient_id = 5 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_status FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-09-15' AND provider_id = 3
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) AS num_appointments FROM Appointments GROUP BY provider_id HAVING num_appointments > 3
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY appointment_time ASC
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, consultation_type FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT provider_name, availability_schedule FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Dentist';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT provider_id, COUNT(*) as total_appointments FROM appointments GROUP BY provider_id HAVING total_appointments > 10;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_provider WHERE provider_name = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointment WHERE provider_id = 1 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_provider ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone FROM patient WHERE patient_email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, status FROM appointment WHERE status = 'scheduled' ORDER BY appointment_date, appointment_time;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM healthcare_provider WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM appointment WHERE status = 'scheduled';
SELECT patient_name, patient_email FROM patient WHERE patient_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, availability_schedule FROM healthcare_provider ORDER BY provider_name ASC, specialty DESC;
SELECT * FROM Providers;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers WHERE specialty = 'Dermatology';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id FROM Appointments WHERE status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_fee FROM Consultations ORDER BY consultation_fee DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM Providers ORDER BY specialty ASC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT provider_name, appointment_date FROM Providers INNER JOIN Appointments ON Providers.provider_id = Appointments.provider_id ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_consultations, AVG(consultation_fee) AS avg_fee FROM Consultations
SELECT * FROM appointments;
SELECT appointment_id, date, time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, email FROM patients WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM consultations WHERE consultation_notes IS NOT NULL LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE patient_id = 1 AND provider_id = 2;
SELECT appointment_id, date, time FROM appointments WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, email, phone_number FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT consultation_id, appointment_id, provider_id, patient_id FROM consultations ORDER BY consultation_id DESC LIMIT 5;
